TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Windows.Forms.Button

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表的 Windows 窗体按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms button that can be added to a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同。The is different from a . 具有其他成员, 使其能够添加到 Excel 工作表, 并为其提供附加方法和属性。The has additional members that enable it to be added to an Excel worksheet and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用`New`构造函数来创建新的。Do not use the `New` constructor to create a new . 使用方法将新添加到工作表中。 Use the method to add a new to a worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例向工作表添加一个控件, 并使用属性将该单元格的边框着色。The following code example adds a control to a worksheet and uses the property to color the border of the cell green. 该按钮的事件处理程序使用属性来隐藏按钮, 然后提示用户选择取消隐藏该按钮, 或允许其保持隐藏状态。The event handler of the button uses the property to hide the button, and then prompts the user to choose to either unhide the button, or allow it to remain hidden. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取 的下边缘与工作表的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets the distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the worksheet.

value.span: 的下边缘与工作表的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等于属性值和属性值的总和。The value of this property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas the property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在当前工作表的单元格 B2 上添加一个控件。The following code example adds a control over cell B2 of the current worksheet. 按钮的事件处理程序显示按钮的和属性的当前值。The event handler of the button displays the current values of the and properties of the button. 当在运行时调整 B 列或第2列的大小时, 这些值将根据列或行的新大小改变。When column B or row 2 is resized at run time, these values change according to the new size of the column or row. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象表示位于 右下角下面的单元格。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the cell that lies under the lower-right corner of the .

span.span: A object that represents the cell that lies under the lower-right corner of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的单元格依赖于控件重叠的单元格数和属性的设置。The cell returned depends on how many cells the control overlaps and the setting of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和属性来获取与控件相关的左上角和右下角单元格。The following code example uses the and properties to get the top left and bottom right cells in relation to a control. 该按钮的事件处理程序将从左上角到右下角单元格的边框颜色。The event handler of the button colors the borders of the top left and bottom right cell red. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 将 置于 Z 顺序的顶层。

span.span: Brings the to the front of the z-order.

returns.span: 此方法将返回一个空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）；否则，此方法将返回 。

span.span: This method returns a null reference ( in Visual Basic); otherwise this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将的 z 顺序设置为集合中的最后一个索引; z 顺序的编号与集合中索引的编号相反。This method sets the z-order of the to the last index in the collection; the numbering of the z-order is the opposite of the numbering of the index in the collection. 集合中的索引越高, 的 z 顺序越低。The higher the index in the collection, the lower the z-order of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和方法来设置工作表上三个控件的 z 顺序。The following code example uses the and methods to set the z-order of three controls on a worksheet. 如果单击 z 顺序前面的按钮, 则通过调用将按钮移动到集合的后端。If the button currently at the front of the z-order is clicked, then the button is moved to the back of the collection by calling . 否则, 通过调用将按钮移动到集合的开头。Otherwise, the button is moved to the front of the collection by calling . 请注意, 三个按钮的 z 顺序最初范围为2到4。Note that the z-order of the three buttons initially range from 2 to 4. 工作表上的运行时存储控件最初的 z 顺序位置为1。The Runtime Storage Control on the worksheet initially has the z-order position of 1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个控件, 该控件在用户单击它时将其自身复制到剪贴板。The following code example demonstrates a control that copies itself to the Clipboard when the user clicks it. 该按钮的事件处理程序调用方法, 将该按钮作为位图复制到剪贴板。The event handler of the button calls the method to copy the button to the Clipboard as a bitmap. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于是在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建的, 因此此属性返回字符串 x, 它等效于十六进制数5843454c 等效。Because the was created in Microsoft Office Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件添加到当前工作表。The following code example adds a control to the current worksheet. 此按钮的事件处理程序显示和属性的值。The event handler for this button displays the values of the and properties. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 从工作表中删除动态创建的 并将其从 中移除。

span.span: Deletes a dynamically created from the worksheet and removes it from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅用于在运行时以编程方式创建的。This method should only be used with a that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在设计时添加到工作表中的调用此方法, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a that is added to the worksheet at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个控件, 该控件在用户单击它时将其删除。The following code example demonstrates a control that deletes itself when the user clicks it. 按钮的事件处理程序调用方法以删除按钮。The event handler of the button calls the method to delete the button. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 获取或设置 的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the .

value.span: 的高度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The height of the in points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对和属性值所做的更改会导致的属性值发生更改。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the to change. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件的大小调整和重定位行为进行了比较。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 第一个按钮的 事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改大小, 但仍保留在工作表中的同一位置。 The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改工作表中的位置, 但保持相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays in the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取 在工作表上的 集合内的索引号。

span.span: Gets the index number of the within the collection of on the sheet.

value.span: 在工作表上的 集合内的索引号。

span.span: The index number of the within the collection of on the sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表中的控件的索引值从2开始, 因为它是工作表的集合的索引。The index value of controls added to the Microsoft Office Excel worksheet starts at 2 because it is the index of the collection of the sheet. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向工作表添加了三个控件。The following code example adds three controls to a worksheet. 这些按钮共享一个事件处理程序, 该处理程序使用属性来显示所单击按钮的索引。These buttons share a event handler that uses the property to display the index of the button that was clicked. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 将值设置为负数或大于12288的数字不会引发异常, 但会导致控件设置为0到12288之间。Setting the value to a negative number or a number higher than 12288 does not throw an exception but results in the control being set between 0 and 12288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件的大小调整和重定位行为进行了比较。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 第一个按钮的 事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改大小, 但仍保留在工作表中的同一位置。 The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改工作表中的位置, 但保持相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays in the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当工作表受保护时，在设计时能否修改 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the can be modified at design time when the sheet is protected.

value.span: 如果当工作表受保护时不能在设计时修改 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cannot be modified at design time when the sheet is protected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当工作表受保护时才能锁定。A can only be locked when the sheet is protected. 在设计时无法移动锁定的或调整其大小。A locked cannot be moved or resized at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件添加到当前工作表, 并将其中一个按钮的属性`true`设置为。The following code example adds two controls to the current worksheet and sets the property of one of the buttons to `true`. 然后, 该示例将保护工作表, 并使用方法将 Microsoft Office Excel 置于设计模式。The example then protects the worksheet and uses the method to place Microsoft Office Excel into design mode. 此时, 可移动解锁按钮并调整其大小, 但不能移动锁定按钮或调整其大小。At this point, the unlocked button can be moved and resized, but the locked button cannot be moved or resized. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的父级是一个容器控件, 它将与文档 ( 而不是包含的) 连接到。The parent of a is a container control that connects the with the document, not the that contains the . 的父级只能作为进行访问。The parent of a can only be accessed as an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件添加到当前工作表。The following code example adds a control to the current worksheet. 此按钮的事件处理程序显示属性的值。The event handler for this button displays the value of the property. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例向工作表添加了两个具有不同运行时行为的控件。The following code example adds two controls that have different run-time behavior to a worksheet. 第一个按钮包含单元格 B2 到 C3 之间的范围。The first button covers the range of cells B2 through C3. 当用户在运行时调整此范围内的列或行的大小时, 第一个按钮将调整大小以调整更改。When the user resizes a column or row in this range at run time, the first button will resize to adjust to the changes. 第二个按钮涵盖单元格 B5 到 C6 的范围, 此按钮的属性设置为。 The second button covers the range of cells B5 through C6, and the property of this button is set to . 当用户在运行时调整此范围内的列或行的大小时, 第二个按钮将不会更改大小。When the user resizes a column or row in this range at run time, the second button will not change size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个控件 , 该控件具有用于生成工作表打印预览的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a control with a event handler that generates a print preview of the worksheet. 事件处理程序提示用户通过设置属性来指定该按钮是否应显示在打印预览中。The event handler prompts the user to specify whether the button should appear in the print preview by setting the property. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 获取 的右边缘与工作表的左边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets the distance, in points, between the right edge of the and the left edge of the worksheet.

value.span: 的右边缘与工作表的左边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the right edge of the and the left edge of the worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值等于属性值和属性值的总和。The value of the property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 将值设置为负数或大于12288的数字不会引发异常, 但会导致控件设置为0到12288之间。Setting the value to a negative number or a number higher than 12288 does not throw an exception but results in the control being set between 0 and 12288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在单元格 B2 上添加一个控件。The following code example adds a control on cell B2. 按钮的事件处理程序显示按钮的和属性的当前值。The event handler of the button displays the current values of the and properties of the button. 当在运行时调整 B 列或第2列的大小时, 这些值将根据列或行的新大小改变。When column B or row 2 is resized at run time, these values change according to the new size of the column or row. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件添加到工作表, 然后使用方法以编程方式选择两个按钮。The following code example adds two controls to a worksheet and then programmatically selects both of the buttons by using the method. 对于参数值 传入的第一次调用,以确保第一个按钮是工作表上的唯一选择。`Replace` `true`The first call to passes in `true` for the value of the `Replace` parameter to make sure that the first button is the only selection on the worksheet. 的第二次调用会`false`传入, 因此除了第一个按钮外, 还会选择第二个按钮。The second call to passes in `false` so that the second button is selected in addition to the first button. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#7)]

span.span: Sends the to the back of the z-order.

returns.span: 此方法将返回一个空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）；否则，此方法将返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将的 z 顺序设置为集合中的第一个索引; z 顺序的编号与集合中索引的编号相反。This method sets the z-order of the to the first index in the collection; the numbering of the z-order is the opposite of the numbering of the index in the collection. 集合中的索引越高, 的 z 顺序越低。The higher the index in the collection, the lower the z-order of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和方法来设置工作表上三个控件的 z 顺序。The following code example uses the and methods to set the z-order of three controls on a worksheet. 如果单击 z 顺序前面的按钮, 则通过调用将按钮移动到集合的后端。If the button currently at the front of the z-order is clicked, then the button is moved to the back of the collection by calling . 否则, 通过调用将按钮移动到集合的开头。Otherwise, the button is moved to the front of the collection by calling . 请注意, 三个按钮的 z 顺序最初范围为2到4。Note that the z-order of the three buttons initially range from 2 to 4. 工作表上的运行时存储控件最初的 z 顺序位置为1。The Runtime Storage Control on the worksheet initially has the z-order position of 1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件添加到当前工作表。The following code example adds a control to the current worksheet. 此按钮的事件处理程序使用属性获取按钮的, 然后将此的宽度增加10磅。The event handler for this button uses the property to get a for the button, and then increases the width of this by 10 points. 尽管事件处理程序只调整按钮的宽度, 但高度也会自动更改, 使控件保持原始比例。Although the event handler only adjusts the width of the button, the height also changes automatically so that the control retains the original proportion. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 获取或设置 的上边缘与工作表的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance, in points, between the top edge of the and the top edge of the worksheet.

value.span: 的上边缘与工作表的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the top edge of the and the top edge of the worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件的大小调整和重定位行为进行了比较。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 第一个按钮的 事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改大小, 但仍保留在工作表中的同一位置。 The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改工作表中的位置, 但保持相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和属性来获取与控件相关的左上角和右下角单元格。The following code example uses the and properties to get the top left and bottom right cells in relation to a control. 该按钮的事件处理程序将从左上角到右下角单元格的边框颜色。The event handler of the button colors the borders of the top left and bottom right cell red. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例向工作表添加一个控件, 并使用属性将该单元格的边框着色。The following code example adds a control to a worksheet and uses the property to color the border of the cell green. 该按钮的事件处理程序使用属性来隐藏按钮, 然后提示用户选择取消隐藏该按钮, 或允许其保持隐藏状态。The event handler of the button uses the property to hide the button, and then prompts the user to choose to either unhide the button, or allow it to remain hidden. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对和 left 属性值所做的更改会导致更改的属性值。Changes made to the and left property values cause the property value of the to change. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 将值设置为负数或大于12288的数字不会引发异常, 但会导致控件设置为1到12288之间。Setting the value to a negative number or a number higher than 12288 does not throw an exception but results in the control being set between 1 and 12288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件的大小调整和重定位行为进行了比较。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 第一个按钮的 事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改大小, 但仍保留在工作表中的同一位置。 The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整按钮的和属性, 使按钮更改工作表中的位置, 但保持相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取 的 Z 顺序位置。

span.span: Gets the z-order position of the .

value.span: 的 Z 顺序位置。

span.span: The z-order position of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Z 顺序由集合决定。The z-order is determined by the collection. 在任何对象集合中, z 顺序后面的对象是*集合*(1), z 顺序的前面的对象是*集合*`Count`(*集合*)。In any collection of objects, the object at the back of the z-order is *collection*(1), and the object at the front of the z-order is *collection*(*collection*.`Count`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置工作表上三个控件的 z 顺序。The following code example uses the property to set the z-order of three controls on a worksheet. 如果单击 z 顺序前面的按钮, 则该按钮将移到集合的背面。If the button currently at the front of the z-order is clicked, then the button is moved to the back of the collection. 否则, 该按钮将移动到集合的前面。Otherwise, the button is moved to the front of the collection. 请注意, 三个按钮的 z 顺序最初范围为2到4。Note that the z-order of the three buttons initially range from 2 to 4. 工作表上的运行时存储控件最初的 z 顺序位置为1。The Runtime Storage Control on the worksheet initially has the z-order position of 1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#1)]
